Name: Alice | 愛莉澄
About the game: 'Alice | 愛莉澄' is a survival horror set in a Japanese construction site. Aim to escape from the construction site while escaping from the urban legendary woman. 'The full version of 'Alice | 愛莉澄' is now available on Steam !!' ■Additional elements Increased volume from 'Alice | 愛莉澄【DEMO】'. Addition of save function and adjustment around UI make it easier to play. ■Synopsis --2015, Tokyo. There, an urban legend was prevalent about a woman. Rumors of a ghost of a mistress called 'Alice'. Everyone was on the topic, but I didn't mind. That day was late at the university club drinking party, I couldn't make it in time for the last train, so I had no choice but to go home on foot. On my way home, when I came near a pitch-black construction site, I decided to take a shortcut, I decided to go through the camera I had just in one hand. However, there I came across something that didn't seem to belong to this world.
